Key Match Events: The Lakers clawed back from an early 22-point deficit against the Suns
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Davis was asked if he could name the two other Lakers greats to match his scorching start
LeBron James, 39, said 'We know what he's going to do defensively, but offensively we have to find him in multiple places on the floor throughout the whole game.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: James, a 22-year veteran, isn't exactly admitting he is slowing down, however. Look no further than his answer to being asked if he would play Saturday on the second night of a back-to-back against the Sacramento Kings as evidence.
Others: JJ Redick, like the rest of the team, passed on the credit to Davis too.
The Lakers improved to a 2-0 record
